description:
HBO has confirmed that viewers will go inside The Newsroom for a third season.HBO电视台已经确认，观众们将会可以看到《新闻编辑室》的第三季。

Aaron Sorkin will return as executive producer for what the network has also confirmed will be the show's final season, with former The Office showrunner Paul Lieberstein also coming on board as a producer.Aaron Sorkin 在第三季中将会重新操刀执行制片人，另外《办公室》前制片人Paul Lieberstein也会出任制片人，而这也会是这部美剧的最后一季。

HBO Programming president Michael Lombardo told us:“I’m sure this farewell season will be one to remember.” Returning cast regulars include Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, Sam Waterston, John Gallagher, Jr., Alison Pill, Thomas Sadoski, Dev Patel and Olivia Munn.HBO节目总裁Michael Lombardo告诉记者：“我相信这个告别季将会是值得记住的一季。”Jeff Daniels、Emily Mortimer、Sam Waterston、John Gallagher、Jr., Alison Pill、Thomas Sadoski、Dev Patel和Olivia Munn都将在这一季继续出现。

No word yet when Season 3 will premiere.目前还没有第三季何时开播的具体消息。

title: 《新闻编辑室》被续订最后一季
